name: Cataclysmic Cheerful Calcragra
desc: If a face-up EARTH monster you control is destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Cataclysmic Cheerful Calcragra" once per turn.
str2: Send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY
